__localization_translator_list__: Localization Translator List (GitHub Profile Name: Display Nickname)
__localization_translator_list_end__: This is the end marker for the localization translator list. DO NOT DELETE THIS LINE.
administrator_protection_is_enabled: Administrator Protection is enabled, some features will be disabled. Please turn off Administrator Protection and restart the PC before trying again.
app_is_not_running_as_administrator: MSPCManagerHelper is not running as administrator, some features will be disabled. Please run the app as administrator.
narrator_is_running: A screen narrator (such as Narrator) is currently running, MSPCManagerHelper does not currently support screen narrators. Please seek assistance from others to continue.
operating_system_is_not_windows_nt_based: The operating system is not Windows NT-based, the app will exit.
some_windows_utilities_are_unavailable:
Some Windows utilities are unavailable, some features will be disabled. For more details, please check the log file.
Log File Location: {log_file_path}
windows_server_installation_type_is_core: The current Windows Server installation type is Server Core, some features will be disabled. To enable all features, please reinstall Windows Server with Desktop Experience to continue.
get_help_description: Open the Microsoft PC Manager Official Website for More Help
official_website_description: Open the Microsoft PC Manager Official Website for More Information
privacy_policy_content_1: MSPCManagerHelper (hereinafter referred to as "the Software") does not collect or upload any data in any form, including but not limited to computer identifiers, geographic information, etc. All data collection while using the Software is performed by Microsoft® Windows® Operating System and software such as Microsoft PC Manager.
privacy_policy_content_2: When you visit certain links (e.g., https://learn.microsoft.com/?wt.mc_id=studentamb_474966), a Microsoft Student Ambassador tracking code will be used to help the developer count the number of visitors. All tracking services on these websites are performed by Microsoft.
privacy_settings_description: Open the Privacy & Security Page in Windows Settings
redirect_to_official_website_to_get_help: You will be redirected to the official website of Microsoft PC Manager. Please contact us from the 'More Contact' section at the bottom of the website for help.
term_of_use_content_preface: Welcome to MSPCManagerHelper (hereinafter referred to as "the Software"). Please carefully read the following terms of use (hereinafter referred to as "the Terms") before using the Software. By downloading, installing, or using the Software, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the Software. Terms are subject to change without notice.
term_of_use_content_1_body: The Software is licensed to you by individual developer GuCATs (hereinafter referred to as "the Developer") for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of the Software without the Developer's written permission.
term_of_use_content_2_body: The Software and all its content (including but not limited to text, images, icons, interfaces, code, and trademarks) are protected by copyright laws and other intellectual property laws. The Developer reserves all rights not expressly granted.
term_of_use_content_3_body: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using the Software. You may not use the Software for any illegal activities or infringe upon the rights of others.
term_of_use_content_4_body: The Developer respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. For detailed information on how we collect, use, and protect your information, please refer to our [Privacy Policy].
term_of_use_content_5_body: The Software is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The Developer does not guarantee that the functions of the Software will meet your requirements or that the operation of the Software will be uninterrupted or error-free. The Developer is not responsible for any issues arising from the use of the Software.
term_of_use_content_6_body: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the Developer shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the Software, even if the Developer has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
term_of_use_content_7_body: The Developer reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. The modified Terms will take effect immediately upon being posted in the Software or on the Developer's website. Your continued use of the Software signifies your acceptance of the modified Terms.
term_of_use_content_8_body: If you violate these Terms, the Developer reserves the right to immediately terminate your license to use the Software without prior notice.
term_of_use_content_9_body: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Country/Region], without regard to its conflict of law principles.
term_of_use_content_10_body: The Software is licensed under the MIT open source license. You can view the details in the MIT License: https://github.com/Goo-aw233/MSPCManagerHelper/blob/main/LICENSE.
term_of_use_content_11_body_1: For licenses and notices of third-party software, please refer to: https://github.com/Goo-aw233/MSPCManagerHelper/blob/main/ThirdPartyNotices.txt.

help_window_content_title: Welcome to MSPCManagerHelper, this is the app's help window.
help_window_content_args_1:
Running the app with arguments:
All arguments support the use of / or - or -- forms, such as /?, -? and --?. In the following demonstrations, /? is used to complete.
help_window_content_args_3: Use the /? or /h or /help argument to open the help window.
help_window_content_args_5: Use the /devmode argument to enable developer mode, which will enable some advanced features for developers to use.
help_window_content_args_7: Use the /debugmode argument to enable debug mode, which will log more information for troubleshooting and will have the same features as developer mode.
help_window_content_args_9: Use the /bypasschecks argument to bypass system checks at startup, which will disable all startup check items.
cleanup_after_exit_description: Clean Up Any Residuals After Exiting the App
failed_to_get_mspcm_version_info: Unable to Get Microsoft PC Manager Version Information at This Time, Which May Be Due to Microsoft PC Manager Not Being Installed or a System Issue
failed_to_load_windows_installation_info: Unable to Get Windows Installation Information at This Time, Please Get More Information in Windows Settings > System > About
mspcm_beta_version_is: Microsoft PC Manager Public Beta Version
run_as_administrator_description: Restart the App and Run as Administrator
start_mspcm_beta_button: Start Microsoft PC Manager Public Beta
welcome_message: Welcome to MSPCManagerHelper! This tool is designed to help you manage Microsoft PC Manager. Please select a feature from the navigation menu to continue. Before using MSPCManagerHelper, please read the 'Terms of Use' and 'Privacy Policy' thoroughly. By continuing to use, you agree to these terms.
app_display_language_description: Select the Display Language for the App
appearance_description: Choose Your Preferred App Display Style
compatibility_mode_description: Use Legacy Windows Commands to Improve Compatibility, but May Reduce Performance of Some Features
follow_system_font_settings_description: Use the System's Current Font Settings Instead of Following the App's Font Settings
support_developer_description: Add Contributor ID when Browsing Microsoft URLs to Support the Developer
